# gux-tab-panel
Unlike gux-tab-panel, gux-tab-panel uses the shadow dom


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                         | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `tabId`  | `tab-id`  | Tab id of the tab that is associated with the panel | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                  | Description                            | Type                  |
| ---------------------- | -------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `guxactivepanelchange` | Triggers when the active panel changes | `CustomEvent<string>` |


## Methods

### `guxSetActive(active: boolean) => Promise<void>`



#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`

| Slot | Description |
| ---- | ----------- |
|      | content     |
